backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores sequentially indexed Valentine responses, checks admin access with password 2026edit, and returns single or all stored responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three Valentine-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing major frontend files including index.html behavior, redirecting App.tsx, and backend client wrapper.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Full interactive Valentine page with animations, decorations, evasive button logic, admin panel, and backend-connected response features.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component that immediately redirects to index.html while keeping query parameters; shows loading screen briefly.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches a backend actor, updating on identity changes and managing related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global CSS, and renders the redirecting App component.
frontend/src/valentine/backendClient.ts: Lightweight wrapper creating a backend actor and exposing functions for recording responses and admin-gated retrieval.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color tokens, themes, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project state for fixing a runaway button and repairing a hidden admin login, including credentials, known bugs, and existing feature requirements. It also lists architectural notes and marks the work as a fix request.
